Attributes.description: Safety evaluation of tailings storage facilities as a system, including tailings transport and containment structures. Consequence classifications. Credible failure modes. Breach analyses. Risk management and reporting. Emergency planning. Critical controls. Change management. Governance frameworks.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Thu, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 20:00, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
